attributes.action: We should elect a new government before the process to leave the EU commences.
attributes.additional_details: Nigel Farage has openly admitted that the pledge to invest more in the NHS was incorrect and the response in tb  financial markets are proof of the economic impact of the out result.
attributes.background: Following the Brexit vote it has become clear that many people voted out either due to misinormation or as a protest vote, never expecting it to happen.  We should now elect a government to steer us through the process or look for an alternative option such as a regnotiation.
